name: 3d legend
desc: The Legend module is used to place a color scale bar in the viewer window.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Legend Direction 3D
properties.desc: The Legend Direction 3D allows the user to set the orientation of the Legend when creating a 3D Legend.

properties.name: X Origin
properties.desc: The starting X coordinate to draw the Legend from.

properties.name: Y Origin
properties.desc: The starting Y coordinate to draw the Legend from.

properties.name: Z Origin
properties.desc: The starting Z coordinate to draw the Legend from.

properties.name: Legend Size
properties.desc: The Size of the Legend in Coordinate Space.

properties.name: Aspect Ratio
properties.desc: The Aspect Ratio restricts the width of the legend to a percentage of the Legend Size.

properties.name: Width To Depth Aspect Ratio
properties.desc: The Aspect Ratio restricts the depth of the legend to a percentage of the Legend Size.

properties.name: Labels On
properties.desc: The Labels On toggle is used to specify whether or not the data labels are to be displayed with the Legend.

properties.name: Label Min
properties.desc: The Label Min toggle places a label at the bottom (min) of the data. This only applies to linear or log unformatted.

properties.name: Label Max
properties.desc: The Label Max toggle places a label at the top (max) of the data. This only applies to linear or log unformatted.

properties.name: Label Color
properties.desc: The Color to set each label.

properties.name: Label Type
properties.desc: The Label Type allows the user to choose between data generated labels or user specified labels.

properties.name: Logarithmic Decades
properties.desc: When the data has been log processed the Logarithmic Decades determines the number of label increments in the color scale bar.  If the Log option is selected the Labels Per Log Decade value is used. If Unformatted is selected the Number Of Intervals is used.

properties.name: Labels Per Log Decade
properties.desc: If the Log Option is Selected for Logarithmic Decades the increments per decade can be set with this value.

properties.name: Number Of Intervals
properties.desc: If the data has been processed in linear space or the Unformatted option is Selected for Logarithmic Decades the total increments for the color scale bar can be set with this value.

properties.name: Type In Labels
properties.desc: If the Type-In Labels option is selected for Label Processing, the labels may be set using this control.

properties.name: Title
properties.desc: The Specified Title to set for the Legend. This option is used when Title Based On is set to User Specified.

properties.name: Units
properties.desc: The Units to add to the end of each label.

properties.name: Units Display
properties.desc: The Units Display will affect where the units for the Legend will display, either after each value or appended to the title.

properties.name: Format Label Numbers
properties.desc: The Format Label Numbers control allows the user to set how numbers that are turned into labels will be formatted.

properties.name: Decimal Precision
properties.desc: Removed

properties.name: Label Offset
properties.desc: The Label Offset is the distance from the Legend the labels are created.

properties.name: Title Offset
properties.desc: The Title Offset is the distance from the Legend the title is created.

properties.name: Font Type
properties.desc: The Label Type allows the user to select between three font types. Forward Facing Fonts will always be aligned to the View.  TrueType fonts are standard fonts.  Line fonts are low impact fonts which perform better when large numbers of labels are generated.

properties.name: TrueType Font Style
properties.desc: The TrueType Font Style allows the user to alter the basic look of the font.

properties.name: Line Font Style
properties.desc: The Line Font Style allows the user to alter the basic look of the font.

properties.name: 3D Label Settings
properties.desc: 3D Label Settings allow the user to align the labels to an appropriate view.

properties.name: Forward Facing Style
properties.desc: Forward Facing Style allows the user to align the labels to an appropriate view and to alter the basic layout of the font.

properties.name: Width Height Aspect
properties.desc: The Width Height Aspect determines the aspect ratio of the label text. A small width to height ratio creates narrow text and a large ratio creates wide text.  This is not enabled when using a Forward Facing Font.

properties.name: Position Around Scale
properties.desc: The Position Around Scale lets the user choose which corner of the break on the color scale to start writing the label at.  For 2D Legends the Front, Middle, and Back options are not meaningful.

properties.name: Prepend Min
properties.desc: The Prepend Min string is placed before the label for the minimum value in the Legend.

properties.name: Prepend Max
properties.desc: The Prepend Max string is placed before the label for the maximum value in the Legend.

properties.name: Datamap Min
properties.desc: The Datamap Min value is used to override the default minimum range from the input when setting the color scale

properties.name: Datamap Max
properties.desc: The Datamap Max value is used to override the default maximum range from the input when setting the color scale

properties.name: Flip Legend
properties.desc: The Flip Legend toggle inverts the legend putting high values at the bottom.

properties.name: Boundary Lines
properties.desc: The Boundary Lines toggle specifies whether or not a boundary box is to be drawn around the Legend scale bar.

properties.name: Value Markers
properties.desc: The Value Markers toggle specifies whether or not a tick mark is to be drawn at each label location.

properties.name: Boundary
properties.desc: The Boundary value offsets the boundary lines from the Legend. The lines are offset in the directions perpindicular to the orientation.  For example if the legend is oriented in the X direction the boundary is offset in Y and Z.

properties.name: Boundary Color
properties.desc: The Boundary Color sets the color of the lines that surround and divide the Legend.

properties.name: Display Scale In Output
properties.desc: The Display Scale in Output toggle specifies whether or not to output the colored portion of the legend in the Legendï¿½s Output Object port.

properties.name: Force Gradiated Colors
properties.desc: The Force Gradiated Colors toggle will cause the Legend to display gradiated colors instead of solid color breaks when contour data is passed in.

properties.name: Offset In Z Only
properties.desc: The Offset in Z Only toggle specifies whether (when on) to offset the boundary only in the z direction.
